title: En Nenjil Oru Poo Lyrics Baana Kaathadi
stanzas: <div>En Nenjil Oru Poo Lyrics Baana Kaathadi

En nenjil oru poo
poothathu athan paer
ennavena kaetten

en kannil thee vandhadhu
athan paer ennavena
kaetten

enna adhai imaigal kaettadhu
enna adhai idhyam kaettadhu
kadhal ena uyirum
sonnadhanbae.
kadhal ena uyirum
sonnadhanbae.

en peyaril oru paer
serndhadhu andha
paer ennavena kaetten

en theevil oru kaal
vandhadhu andha
aal engavena kaetten

kanndupidi ullam sonnadhu
unnidathil urugi nindradhu
kadhal idhu uyirum
sonnadhanbae..
kadhal idhu uyirum
sonnadhanbae..

Silanerathil nam paarvaigal
thavaraagave edai podume
mazhai nerathil
vizhiyorathil iruzhagave
oli thondrume.

idhayum edai podave
idhayam thadaiyaai illai
purindhadhum
varundhinen unnidam

ennai nee maatrinaai
engum niram poottinaai
en manam illaiye ennidam

En nenjil oru poo
poothathu athan paer
ennavena kaetten

en kannil thee vandhadhu
athan paer ennavena
kaetten

Unai paarthadhum annaale
kadhal nenjil varave illai
edhir kaatrile kudai polave
saaindhen indru ezhave illai

iravil urakkam illai
pagalil velicham illai
kadhalil karaivadhum
oru sugam

edharkku paarthen endru
indru purindhenadaa
ennai nee yaetrukkol
muzhuvadhum.

En nenjil oru poo
poothathu athan paer
ennavena kaetten

en kannil thee vandhadhu
athan paer ennavena
kaetten

enna adhai imaigal kaettadhu
enna adhai idhyam kaettadhu
kadhal ena uyirum
sonnadhanbae.
kadhal ena uyirum
sonnadhanbae.
